idea:
DELVE AGRICOLE FARMERS ASSOCIATES PRIVATE LIMITED company was established in 2020  as an exporter and supplier of Turkish dried fruits & nuts products. We do both organic and conventional, in bulk and retail packing.

We specialized in the manufacture, export and supply chain of agricultural products for Dried Fruits, Sundried Tomatoes and Nuts and also expanded our product range to meet the needs of our customers.  we are constantly evolving in its use of modern technology to provide our worldwide customers new generation packages with the best and high quality product range . We supply our customers all around the world the safest and finest quality goods with dedication to benefit themfrom our long experience in this field.
name: DELVE AGRICOLE FARMERS ASSOCIATES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
mBnk’s Phygital Financial Services Marketplace model provides an unprecedented opportunity for Service Providers to compete on a single platform to pitch a host of digital financial services for Consumers through its Retailer network in India.

mBnk offers a fine blend wherein Digital Financial Services via an Assisted Mode through a Trade Distribution Channel is offered to end customers.

These users are underbanked and underserved hence have remained outside the ambit of financial services in India.

mBnk has pioneered a Phygital Marketplace for Financial Services through Retailers who offer neighborhood trust and ease of access for customers who wish to transact digitally.

mBnk has successfully deployed technology, driven by Artificial Intelligence (AI) & Machine Learning (ML) in its Web and Mobile Apps for Customers who get the best of both worlds.
name: MBNK PHYGITAL FINANCIAL MARKETPLACE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
YOYOO DIGITAL INNOVATION (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED is one of the most renowned and trusted LED Lights Manufacturers of India. we have been manufacturing high-end, eco-friendly LED Lights that are cost effective and energy efficient. We have remained consistent in manufacturing long-lasting LED products such as LED Bulbs, Street Lights, Flood Light, Down lights, Panels, etc. that have helped us in maintaining our esteem in the market.

We understand the importance of setting up good lighting and all the elements that are required for adequate lighting via the marriage of functionality and style. Under the leadership of Anil Kumar, we have managed to carve a niche for ourselves in a substantially short span of time. Through our robust and durable products, we let the quality speak for ourselves. We are focused on delivering LED lights that are of top-notch quality, along with the promotion of renewable energy propagation and execution in India.

We encompass distinctive interests in dealing with a variety of LED lights. We provide complete solution of catering to efficient energy requirements. The unparalleled quality test of our products ensures that we meet the industrial standard of efficient and quality lighting.

Through consistent research and development, our skilled Team of individuals is always focused on finding new ways for enhancing the functionality of our products along with the leading technology.

Yoyo digital  bulbs and lights are designed and tested keeping in mind the longevity of the products. All of our products are reliable with a proven track record of great durability.
name: YOYOO DIGITAL INNOVATION (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
91% of the population globally is exposed to unhealthy levels of pollution, causing public health, environmental and economic crisis. India accounts for an estimated 1 million pollution related deaths each year and 9,80,000 pre-term births, ambient particulate matter and household air pollution causing majority of health-related issues.

We at NEWOT ECOTECH believe that the world today desperately needs to accelerate the implementation of innovations, measures and technology in order to reduce the massive detrimental impact of air pollution. In order to contribute towards this vision, we are working on a technology which uses Organic Medium at its core to moderate pollution. Our focus is not on a single invention but to create an entire ecosystem and we aim to built India’s first Organic Air Purifier which will help cleanse the environment. Hence our product is made through the nature and for the nature.
name: NEWOT ECOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a team of students from IIT Bombay and we are building a product dedicated to college students with the main objective to :

1 Bring Best forward deals from premium outlets for Students Hunger at no extra cost to them

2 We have witnessed the tough schedule of the students and therefore working towards digitalizing the eateries inside the campus to facilitate easy order placement.

3 We provide them with the option to prebook the food and schedule their food delivery.

4 For the student community, we put a step forward to assure them, money is not a big constraint to having good food at the premium outlets.
name: Orezano
